section.title: Procedural Representation
section.para: As with Assertional Knowledge, the representation of Procedural Knowledge reaches beyond the documentation of procedures requested for or performed on the subject of record. Procedural Knowledge can pertain to, e.g.
• Standard ways of performing a procedure

Applied Procedural Knowledge can enable the use of Clinical Pathways, Clinical Decision Support and Knowledge Artifacts (KNARTs) that standardize patient documentation focused on clinical domains and patient situations.
